mapper.select: select a.RID as "MZID", --唯一主键 a.PATIENTNO as "PatientId",--病例号 m.num as "VisitId",--就诊次数 a.PATIENTNAME as "PatientName",--患者姓名 b.dictname as "Sex",--患者性别 a.BRDY as "BirthDate",-- 出生日期 regexp_substr(FN_NEWBIRTHTOAGE(a.brdy),'[0-9]+') as "Age",-- 年龄 replace(FN_NEWBIRTHTOAGE(a.BRDY),regexp_substr(FN_NEWBIRTHTOAGE(a.BRDY),'[0-9]+'),'') as "AgeUnit",-- 年龄单位 a.WEIGHT as "Weight",-- 体重 a.TEL as "Tel",-- 电话 case when a.PSNCERTTYPE='01' then a.CERTNO else null as "IDCard",-- 身份证号 a.HOME as "Address",-- 现住址 c.RESIHOME as "RegisterAdd",-- 户籍地址 c.NATY as Nation,-- 民族 c.LINKMANNAME as "ParentName",-- 家长姓名 e.dictname as "Marriage",-- 婚姻状况 c.WORKNAME as "WorkUnit",-- 工作地址/学校 null as "Education",-- 教育情况 o.DISE_NAME as "DiagnosisName",-- 诊断名称 a.DEPTCODE as "DiagnosisDeptId",-- 就诊科室编号 a.DEPTNAME as "DiagnosisDeptName",-- 就诊科室名称 a.REG_TIME as "DiagnosisDt",-- 就诊日期 a.DOCCODE as "DiagnosisDocId",-- 就诊医生工号 a.DOCNAME as "DiagnosisDocName",-- 就诊医生姓名 decode(a.REGLEVLNAME,'1',0,'0',1) as "IsReturnvisit",-- 复诊标识 null as "StartDt",-- 发病日期 null as "DeathDt"-- 死亡日期 from OPM_DIAGNOSE o,OPR_REGISTER a left join com_dictcodeinfo b on b.typecode='GEND' and a.SEXCODE=b.dictcode left join COM_PATIENTINFO c on a.orgcode=c.orgcode and a.patientno=c.patientno left join com_dictcodeinfo e on e.typecode='MRG_STAS' and c.MARRIED=e.dictcode left join OPM_DIAGNOSE o on a.orgcode =o.orgcode and a.regid =o.regid and o.MAIN_FLAG='1' and o.ISVALID='1' left join (select row_number() over(partition by p.PATIENTNO order by p.crte_time asc) as num, p.* from OPR_REGISTER p where p.orgcode =#{OrgCode}) m on m.orgcode=a.orgcode and m.regid=a.regid where orgcode=#{OrgCode} and REG_TIME >=to_date(StartDate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and REG_TIME <=to_date(EndDate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
